spec_data.Name: perl-Dist-Zilla-App-Command-cover
spec_data.Description:
This is a command plugin for Dist::Zilla. It provides the cover command,
which generates code coverage metrics for your distribution using
Devel::Cover.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:03:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Code coverage metrics for your distribution
